description: Check agent file path and LLM provider configuration

steps.description: Check agent configuration and file paths

queries: UPDATE agents SET agent_type_id = 'llm' WHERE agent_id = 'f9d5d12d-7bbf-4dee-9ee9-6938ee5396bb';
SELECT agent_id, agent_type_id, name, description, type FROM agents;
SELECT name, provider_type, is_active, configuration FROM llm_providers;
